cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the problem of opportunistic access in communication networks, which is a common topic in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the design of optimal policies for channel selection, which involves decision-making under uncertainty and can be related to the sub-categories of Systems and Control (cs.SY), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Machine Learning (cs.LG).
